frameset.edef: to put pressure or besiege on someone

example.parse: (TOP (S (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS دَه)) (NP-PRD (NOUN غَيْر) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3P هُم)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC أَصْلاً)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL مُحاصِرِين) (NP (DET+NOUN الفِكْر) (DET+ADJ الإِسْلامِيّ)))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يِخَنَّقُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (PRON_3MS ُه))))))))))
